title: Klutch Academy
overview: The series will follow six college basketball prospects who are preparing for their professional careers as they lead up to the NBA Draft and showcase how KLUTCH is more than an agency.Athletes featured on the show include Brandon Boston Jr. (former University of Kentucky Forward), Kai Jones (former University of Texas Forward), Jalen Johnson (Duke University), Moses Moody, Jericho Sims, Scottie Lewis, and the family of Terrence Clarke.
